servers and workstations (about 100 PCs.) Development of monitoring system for server services, backups and
Administration of servers based on Windows 2003, 2008. Maintenance and troubleshooting of network equipment

Administration of Windows 2003 servers, Oracle SQL, specialized server-based cash programs. Maintenance of
cash registers and weighing-machines in trading hall. Workability support for local area network, users PC.
